description: A weekly prestige service to Melbourne using the SyberJet aircraft. Departs Dairy Flat on Friday mid-morning and returns from Melbourne on Sunday mid-afternoon.
A weekday shuttle service to Rotorua using a Cirrus aircraft. Two round trips each weekday: early morning outbound with a quick return, then late afternoon outbound with evening return.

A three times weekly service to Great Barrier Island's Claris Airport using a Cirrus aircraft. Departs Dairy Flat on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday mornings. Returns from Claris on Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday mornings.
A twice weekly service to Tuuta Airport in the Chatham Islands using a HondaJet. Outbound flights leave on Tuesday and Friday; return flights on Wednesday and Saturday.
A weekly scenic flight to Lake Tekapo using a HondaJet. Departs Dairy Flat on Monday and returns from Lake Tekapo on Tuesday.
